name: mcp-ai-workbench
description: MCP AI Workbench - AI-powered workspace management and chat interface

scripts.dev: npm run cleanup:ports && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:clean: npm run cleanup:ports && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:generate && npm run db:migrate
scripts.start: npm run cleanup:ports && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.start:prod: npm run cleanup:ports && concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
